name: Viking Axes
description: Download our game and have fun swinging axes. Our fast paced and point based game is umm... awesome! Each time you hit the shield on he viking ship you get a point. Play and try to break your highscore. And I bet you can't break Ron's highscore of 72 (he's one of our developers, so he might have faked this one), but the sure thing is you will get hooked ;)
